data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Calabria, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Calabria, Italy
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Calabria unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Calabria, Italy not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 375,063 who are far from you in Calabria, Italy from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bosniak people.
the state of Calabria has (about) 29,268 people who know Jesus, 1,604,969 people who know about him culturally, and 375,063 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Calabria, Italy.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Calabria, Italy has a population of 2,009,300.

We estimate Calabria has 29,268 people who might know Jesus, 1,604,969 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 375,063 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Calabria, Italy.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
